job.title: Data Scientist
job.description: <p><strong>Location - Texas</strong></p><p><strong>Requirements</strong></p><ul><li>Strong knowledge of Python and general software development skills (source code management, debugging, testing, deployment, etc.).</li><li>Strong understanding of text preprocessing and normalization techniques, such as tokenization, and POS tagging.</li><li>Ability to design NLP pipelines to meet customer requirements</li><li>Familiarity with different approaches for training entity tagging models (e.g. CRF, RNN, CNN, Transformer).</li><li>Experience with asynchronous programming is a plus.</li><li>Familiarity with deep learning frameworks such as Tensorflow and Pytorch a plus.</li><li>Familiarity with computer vision deep learning algorithms a plus (CNN, RCNN)</li><li>BS, MS and/or PhD in Mathematics, Physics, etc</li></ul><p>Interested candidates can mail their resumes to career@kalongens.com</p>
